name: Sesame Buttered Broccoli
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. broccoli (I used frozen, already cut)
1 tsp. sesame seed, toasted (the toasted part is optional, but it does give a nice crunch)
instructions: In 2-qt. saucepan, heat 1" water to boiling. Add broccoli and return to boil; let boil 4-6 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain well and place broccoli in serving bowl. In small, separate bowl stir remaining ingredients until well mixed; pour over broccoli and toss to coat.
